content:
Airborne assault troops have created their own site where you can apply for the service by selecting a team yourself.

About thisIt is saidon the site of the AFU DShV.

“Our feature is the speed, mobility and high level of preparation of each fighter.

Airborne assault troops are a collective of high professionals and real friends. Their experience and a large number of successful military operations are confidence that there are experienced commanders, attentive and adamant in battle with you, ”the site is called on.

The DShV invites bold and determined to their ranks and seek specialists in different directions.

“The path of DShv is to always be the first. It's your way. Choose DShv! ” - emphasized Vijkov.

As reportedArmyinform, the recruitment of GUR MOU active actions is ongoing.
title: DShV launched a site where you can go to a specific brigade
description: This is stated on the website of the DSSV of the Armed Forces. “Our feature is speed, mobility and high ...
author: Army Inform
